summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) inmate history and assignment report for Jeffrey Edward Epstein, generated on August 10, 2019. It details his custody status, housing assignments, medical and security designations, and attorney visits while incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The report shows he was transferred to a hospital on the morning of August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the Bureau of Prisons inmate history and assignment report, detailing his custody, housing, medical status, and movements within the MCC New York.

persons.name: N. Reid
persons.context: Listed as the Unit Manager for Epstein's housing unit at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, with contact extensions provided.

connections.description: N. Reid is listed as the Unit Manager responsible for Epstein's housing unit at the MCC New York.

events.title: Hospital Transfer
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was transferred from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York to a local hospital with a scheduled return to US Marshals custody.

events.title: Court Appearance and Admission
events.description: Epstein had a court appearance in the Southern District of New York with a scheduled return, and was subsequently admitted as a pre-sentenced adult inmate.

events.title: Initial Custody
events.description: Epstein was taken into custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

events.title: Security Threat Designation
events.description: Epstein was given a security threat designation of 'HISTORY OF COMMITTING RAPE' within the BOP system.

events.title: Frequent Attorney Visits
events.description: The report logs numerous attorney visits for Epstein, occurring almost daily from July 8, 2019, through August 9, 2019.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York (NYM-NEW YORK MCC)
170 Williams Street, New York, New York 10038 (listed as release destination agency address, likely NewYork-Presbyterian Hospital)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York from July 6, 2019.
On August 10, 2019, at 07:47, Epstein was transferred on an 'ESC TRP TO LOC HOSP' (escorted trip to local hospital) with a scheduled return to US Marshals custody.
Epstein's BOP security threat designation was listed as 'HISTORY OF COMMITTING RAPE' as of July 10, 2019.
The report shows Epstein had very frequent attorney visits in the weeks leading up to August 10, 2019.
Epstein's charges are listed as 'SEX TRAFFICKING CONSP.' and 'SEX TRAFFICKING OF MINORS'.
